title: Foundation & Infrastructure
focus: Building the Core Brain & Nervous System (Infrastructure for AI & Rules).
deliverables: Real-time Data Pipeline: Streaming live banking data using Debezium (CDC) for database changes and Kafka/NiFi for event streaming.
Unified Data Mart: Centralized, high-speed storage for AI analysis (Apache Doris for Real-Time Analytics).
Secure User Portal: Dashboard with strict access controls for officers (Spring Boot + Keycloak).

EAIP Leadership (AI Core): Setting up the independent AI Engine (FastAPI) with 'Unsupervised Learning' models (like Isolation Forests,XGBoost etc) that flag anomalies based on statistical deviation immediately.
EAIP Leadership (Knowledge Base): Teaching the AI to read and understand BFIU guidelines (RAG Prototyping with Elasticsearch).
testing: Mid-Feb: Verify that Debezium captures 100% of CBS changes and Data Mart aggregates in real-time.
notes: Strategy: We use the Datamart to fetch data and perform operations in seconds, eliminating the need for offline training.

title: General Banking (MVP)
focus: AI & Rules for Daily Transactions (Covering high-volume checks).
deliverables: Standard Rules Engine (Deterministic Logic): Automating 30+ hard logic checks (e.g., 'More than 30 transactions/day') using Kogito. Queries -Data Mart for instant status checks (e.g., 'Is Account Frozen?')(RMS).
EAIP Leadership (Behavioral AI): Deploying AI models to catch subtle anomalies like sudden spending spikes using XGBoost on ''Apache Doris'' real-time aggregates.
EAIP Leadership (Contextual Intelligence): AI checks historical behavior to judge if a transfer is truly suspicious (e.g., 'Crypto-like Behavior') using RAG on transaction notes.
EAIP Leadership (Smart Agents): Autonomous agents that investigate complex patterns (e.g., 'Many to One', 'One to Many' funds funneling) using LangGraph to traverse transaction links.
testing: Mid-Apr: MVP Launch Test. Validate that AI catches 100% of known test cases and reduces false alarms by ~60%.
notes: Milestone: MVP Live. The system starts delivering value by handling the bulk of daily transactions with intelligent filtering. Note: Includes Eid al-Fitr holiday break (~Mar 19-23).
milestone: MVP Milestone: Foundation + General + Remittance live by mid-May

title: Remittance
deliverables: Remittance Rules (Deterministic Logic): Threshold checks for international transfers and 'High Risk Country' transactions (Kogito Rules checking **Data Mart** lookups).
EAIP Leadership (Geo-Location AI): AI analyzes geographic risk (e.g., 'High-risk country' + 'Unusual IP address') by correlating login IPs with transaction origins.
EAIP Leadership (Mule Detection): Specialized AI agents to identify 'money mules' moving illicit funds across borders (Graph Analysis).
EAIP Leadership (Network Analysis): Tracing connections between senders and receivers to find hidden rings.
EAIP Leadership (Auto-Reporting): AI drafts the narrative for Suspicious Transaction Reports (STRs) automatically (LLM Generation).
testing: Mid-May: Test AI's ability to spot complex cross-border schemes and validate Geo-IP accuracy.
notes: Efficiency: AI leverages patterns learned in General Banking to quickly master Remittance flows.

title: Trade Finance
deliverables: Trade Data Ingestion: Digitizing Letters of Credit (LC) and Invoices and storing raw files.
EAIP Leadership (Price Analysis): AI compares invoice prices against global averages to spot Over/Under Invoicing.
EAIP Leadership (Document Forensics): AI reads documents to find discrepancies (e.g., quantity mismatch, dual-use goods) using Vector Search.
EAIP Leadership (Complex Network Graph): Visualizing hidden relationships between importers, exporters, and shipping lines (PyTorch Geometric).
EAIP Leadership (Sanction Screening): Checking all parties against global watchlists with fuzzy matching.
Standard Rules Engine (Deterministic Logic): 'High Value Transactions' checks for specific product types or risk categories.
testing: Mid-Jun: Calibrate AI against real-world Trade Based Money Laundering (TBML) scenarios.
notes: High Impact: This is the most complex phase where AI adds massive value by correlating hundreds of documents. Note: Includes Eid al-Adha holiday break (~May 26-31); reduced team availability expected.

title: Credit & Optimization
deliverables: Credit Rules (Deterministic Logic): Monitoring loan utilization, fund diversion, and validation checks (e.g., 'Loan Purpose Mismatch') using Kogito.
EAIP Leadership (Fund Diversion AI): Tracking loan money to ensure it's used for the intended business purpose.
EAIP Leadership (Full Explainability): ensuring EVERY alert (Rules or AI) has a 'Why this was flagged' summary for auditors.
System Calibration: Final fine-tuning to minimize false positives across the entire system.
Audit Readiness: Proving zero data loss and full traceability using **Kafka** logs and **Doris** audit tables.
testing: July: Final End-to-End Pilot. Full system sign-off.
notes: Completion: A fully operational, intelligent AML system ready for production. Schedule accounts for post-holiday ramp-up.
milestone: Full Coverage: 100% of 183 indicators operational by July 31
